1. Respectful Communication
 We encourage a respectful and positive environment where everyone feels welcome. Please engage in conversations with kindness and respect for others’ opinions.


2. Age-Appropriate Content
 EventPulse offers a wide range of content, but certain materials such as 18+ content and crime movies are locked for the safety of children...


3. No Illegal Content
 Posting or sharing illegal content, including pirated movies, games, or any form of unauthorized distribution, is strictly prohibited.


4. Protecting Personal Information
 Protect your personal privacy and respect others’ privacy...


5. Reporting Harmful Behavior
 If you encounter any inappropriate behavior or content, please report it immediately...


6. Content Quality
 Ensure content shared adds value to the community


7. No Explicit or Harmful Content
 Content that is sexually explicit, harmful, or violent is prohibited...


8. Moderation and Enforcement
 EventPulse employs 24/7 moderation...


9. Encouraging Positive Interactions
 Please be constructive in your discussions and share your opinions...

EventPulse is a comprehensive entertainment hub that allows users to explore the latest movies, TV series, and games all in one place.\n\nWhether you\'re looking to watch the hottest new releases or dive into the world of gaming, EventPulse has something for everyone. The app includes rich media content such as trailers, reviews, and ratings, so you can make informed decisions on what to watch or play next.
